mapper.select: SELECT s.user_name as user_name, b.board_no as board_no, b.board_title as board_title, b.board_content as board_content, b.board_views as board_views, count(c.comment_no) as commentCount, b.board_likes as board_likes, b.board_date as board_date FROM boards b, users s, comments c WHERE b.user_no = s.user_no AND c.board_no = b.board_no GROUP BY b.board_no;

SELECT s.user_name as user_name, b.board_no as board_no, b.board_title as board_title, b.board_content as board_content, b.board_views as board_views, count(c.comment_no) as commentCount, b.board_likes as board_likes, b.board_date as board_date FROM boards b, users s, comments c WHERE b.user_no = s.user_no AND c.board_no = b.board_no AND b.board_no='${boardNo}'
